title: Paganini strikes again
creator_credit: Gerry O'Hara, Cyril Randell and CFF Productions
brief_description: Based on the book by Benjamin Lee. This story tells of Mike and Bill, who on returning from a violin lesson, get stuck in a lift and by chance see a clue to a criminal’s identity - his feet. Should they tell the police? And why is the strange boy in their form so scared?
creator_credit_for_label: Gerry O’Hara, Cyril Randell and CFF Productions
